price: And [beware of] the Day when We will gather from every nation a group of those who used to reject Our verses, and they will be driven in ranks.
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ نَحۡشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٖ فَوۡجٗا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ
